## Returns tips that are ideal for attaching a block.

Returns tips that are ideal for attaching a block. The tips can be considered as `non-lazy` and are therefore ideal for attaching a block.

<div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Successful operation.

</div><div><MimeTabs schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{"textAlign":"left"}}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"tips"} required={false} schemaDescription={"The block identifiers that can be used to a attach a block to.
